title: # 490 - Nick Kroll & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with actor/comedian, Nick Kroll. We talk about performing on broadway, therapy, interventions, Big Mouth, Amy Schumer, hosting SNL, and much more! 

 

Big Mouth season 5 is streaming now on Netflix! 

 

Follow Nick here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nickkroll 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/nickkroll 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
